text: Acleris chloroma is a species of moth of the family Tortricidae. It is found in Uganda. The wingspan is about 26 mm. The ground colour of the forewings is verdigris green, dotted and strigulated with black. The hindwings are brownish., 1993: Revision of Apotoforma BUSCK, 1932 (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae), with descriptions of four other Tortricini species. Acta Zoologica Cracoviensia 36 (1): 183-197. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1993 chloroma Category:Moths of Africa
title: Acleris chloroma
